# aliimam

> A set of beautifully designed components that you can customize, extend, and build on. Start here then make it your own. Open Source. Open Code.

This file provides LLM-friendly entry points to documentation and examples.

## Components

- [button](https://aliimam.in/docs/components/button): The button component.

## Examples

- [Button Demo](https://github.com/aliimam-in/blob/main/example/button-demo.tsx): Example usage

## Optional

- [Repository](https://github.com/aliimam-in): Source code and issues
- [Sitemap](https://aliimam.in/sitemap.xml): Indexable pages
